name: Nightwave Leggings (Drifter)
description: Leggings for all of you Dreamers out there.

languages.description: Hosen für alle Träumer da draußen.
languages.name: Hosen: Nightwave (Drifter)

languages.description: Des grèves pour vous tous, Rêveurs.
languages.name: Grèves des Ondes Nocturnes (Voyageur)

languages.description: Pantaloni per tutti i Sognatori là fuori.
languages.name: Pantaloni Nightwave (Drifter)

languages.description: Unos pantalones para todos los Soñadores de allá afuera.
languages.name: Pantalones de Onda Nocturna (Viajero)

languages.description: 适合你们所有梦回者的绑腿。
languages.name: 午夜电波绑腿（漂泊者）

languages.description: 夢見るもの達へのレギンス。
languages.name: Nightwave レギンス（漂流者）

languages.description: Calças para todos os Sonhadores que andam por aí.
languages.name: Calças da Nightwave (Peregrino)

languages.description: เลกกิ้งสำหรับคนช่างฝันทุกคน
languages.name: เลกกิ้ง Nightwave (ดริฟเตอร์)

languages.description: Dışarıdaki tüm Rüyacılar için bir pantolon.
languages.name: Nightwave Pantolonu (Gezgin)
